title: Omicron Infections Seem to Be Milder, Three Research Teams Report
content:
1. Omicron Infections Seem to Be Milder, Three Research Teams Report  The New York Times
  2. The latest on the coronavirus pandemic and the Omicron variant  CNN
  3. Omicron wave appears milder, but concern remains  BBC News
  4. Two Studies Show Much Lower Risk of Hospitalization With Omicron  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Early studies suggest a reduced risk of Covid-19 hospitalization when infected with Omicron compared to Delta  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: オミクロンの感染症は軽症のようだ、3つの研究チームが報告
